LanguageData.TrapPusher.label: push trap
LanguageData.TrapPusher.description: ぶっとぶ。素材で性能が変わる。
LanguageData.TrapPusher_Blueprint.label: push trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapPusher_Frame.label: push trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapPusher_Frame.description: ぶっとぶ。素材で性能が変わる。
LanguageData.TrapElectricPusher.label: electric push trap
LanguageData.TrapElectricPusher.description: 電動でぶっとぶ。素材で性能が変わる。自動再装填。
LanguageData.TrapElectricPusher_Blueprint.label: electric push trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapElectricPusher_Frame.label: electric push trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapElectricPusher_Frame.description: 電動でぶっとぶ。素材で性能が変わる。自動再装填。

LanguageData.TrapPuller_Frame.label: pull trap (building)

LanguageData.TrapElectricPuller.description: 電動でひっぱる。素材で性能が変わる。自動で再装填される。

LanguageData.TrapCTIEDBomb.label: IED trap
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDBomb.description: A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDBomb_Blueprint.label: IED trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDBomb_Frame.label: IED trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDBomb_Frame.description: A mortar shell connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDIncendiary.label: IED incendiary trap
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDIncendiary.description: Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable.
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDIncendiary_Blueprint.label: IED incendiary trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDIncendiary_Frame.label: IED incendiary trap (building)
LanguageData.TrapCTIEDIncendiary_Frame.description: Explosives mixed into an incendiary paste with a chemical trigger for dispersal. Its chemical trigger is simple and reliable.
